channel.title: How does Frame and Mindwarp work?
channel.description:
There are many peoples out there still confuse when getting incorrect result. So in this topic today, i will show you most of the work on Frame and Mindwarp. I had not tested on some ability, so you can come up and tell me the result you got.
*Frame: This basicly effect investigator ability.
-Sheriff/Pally: +Make target show up as Unseen/Cult. +Sheriff's Surv: Make target show up as Assassin.
-Obs: +Follow: Make target seem visited the person who was attacked last night. If there is no attack then the Framed target will show up as not visiting anyone. +Window Peek: Same as Sheriff and Pally.
-Princess: +Flirt: Make target show as Killer/Offensive. Killer/Offensive target will show up as Special/Invest. - Info by WazzaAzza. +Will-o-Wisp: Make target seem attacked someone.
*Mindwarp: This one is a bit harder.
-Drunk/Butler/SS/Invoker: +Normal target will show up as Occ Immune, and Occ Immune target will show up as Occ'able.
-Princess: +Flirt: No info +Will-o-Wisp: Make non-attack target show up as attacked someone and vice versa.
-Sheriff/Pally/Obs Window Peek: +Make NS show up as Evil, and Evil as BD or NS. Also make Neut show up as Evil. - Info from NuclearBurrito.
-Obs: +Follow: Make target not seem visited anyone or getting visited.
-Hunter: +Bear: Make Hunter bielive they was attacked last night.
-Noble: +Gossip: Mindwarp will reverse every ability you see. Example: If you see DNR Heal on target, you will rather see Healed on target.
-Phys/Alch heal: +Make DNR show up as healed, and vice versa. No effect on target who was cured from poison/bleed.
-Prince: +No info.
-Pretender: +No info same as Princess Flirt.
-NK: +No info.

item.title: How does Frame and Mindwarp work?
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
Well on my test, it does show up like that, and it will always show up visit the attacked target with lower number if there is more than 1 attack that night.

Read full topic
item.source: How does Frame and Mindwarp work?

item.title: How does Frame and Mindwarp work?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
SweetyCake:

+Follow: Make target seem visited the person who was attacked last night. If there is no attack then the Framed target will show up as not visiting anyone.

It doesn’t. Especially because there are usually more than one kills per night

Read full topic

item.title: How does Frame and Mindwarp work?
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
There are many peoples out there still confuse when getting incorrect result.
So in this topic today, i will show you most of the work on Frame and Mindwarp.
I had not tested on some ability, so you can come up and tell me the result you got.

*Frame:
This basicly effect investigator ability.

-Sheriff/Pally:
+Make target show up as Unseen/Cult.
+Sheriff’s Surv: Make target show up as Assassin.

-Obs:
+Follow: Make target seem visited the person who was attacked last night. If there is no attack then the Framed target will show up as not visiting anyone.
+Window Peek: Same as Sheriff and Pally.

-Princess:
+Flirt: Make target show as Killer/Offensive.
Killer/Offensive target will show up as Special/Invest. - Info by WazzaAzza.
+Will-o-Wisp: Make target seem attacked someone.

*Mindwarp:
This one is a bit harder.

-Drunk/Butler/SS/Invoker:
+Normal target will show up as Occ Immune, and Occ Immune target will show up as Occ’able.

-Princess:
+Flirt: No info
+Will-o-Wisp: Make non-attack target show up as attacked someone and vice versa.

-Sheriff/Pally/Obs Window Peek:
+Make NS show up as Evil, and Evil as BD or NS. Also make Neut show up as Evil. - Info from NuclearBurrito.

-Obs:
+Follow: Make target not seem visited anyone or getting visited.

-Hunter:
+Bear: Make Hunter bielive they was attacked last night.

-Noble:
+Gossip: Mindwarp will reverse every ability you see. Example: If you see DNR Heal on target, you will rather see Healed on target.

-Phys/Alch heal:
+Make DNR show up as healed, and vice versa. No effect on target who was cured from poison/bleed.

-Prince:
+No info.

-Pretender:
+No info same as Princess Flirt.

-NK:
+No info.
